attr.title: Fungus Reaper
attr.desc: An 'eerie' turn-based tower defense roguelite! Tons of different mushlings to collect for customizing each run to your playstyle. Turn-based action with a twist! The clock is always ticking ... take too long and the beasts will move before you!
attr.inst: Download the game https://store.steampowered.com/app/2406640/Fungus_Reaper/ and copy the exe file into the port folder.
